name: Pawlo Purrcasso
description:
In "Pawlo Purrcasso" you will play a cat who just happened to destroy all the artworks for her exhibition. In order to save it, you become the artist yourself and try to recreate the paintings with your paws. Maybe the exhibition will still become successfull!

Technical Notes

  • This is game will not work on mobile devices as it needs a keyboard or a gamepad to work.
  • For optimal performance please download the game.

Credits

Kathin Radtke (she/her)- Programmer and energetic person all around You can find her on Instagram and Twitter

Zoë Koç (she/her) - Game Designer and really into plants and cats She's been seen around here: Twitter

Sophie A. Herrmann (she/her) - Artist and daydreamer Check out her art and stuff: Artstation and Youtube

Kasimir Blust (he/him)- Programmer and getting really good at cooking. Find him on Twitter

Audio
